Name: removeInsert1Start
Comment: Remove indicator of start of inserted words (like "not") after pre

Name: removeInsert1End
Comment: Remove indicator of end of inserted words (like "not") after pre

Name: removeInsert2Start
Comment: Remove indicator of start of inserted words (like "not") after helper

Name: removeInsert2Start
Comment: Remove indicator of start of inserted words (like "not") after helper now \add ..\add*

Name: removeInsert2Start
Comment: Remove indicator of start of inserted words (like "not") after split helper

Name: removeInsert2End
Comment: Remove indicator of end of inserted words (like "not") after helper

Name: removeHyphenSpaces
Comment: Remove hyphen (untranslated article) surrounded by spaces

Name: removeHyphenSpace
Comment: Remove hyphen (untranslated article) followed by space

Name: removeSpaceHyphen
Comment: Remove hyphen (untranslated article) preceded by space

Name: reduceDoubleUnderlines
Comment: Reduce double underlines in entire file

Name: reduceDoubleSpaces
Comment: Reduce double spaces in entire file

Name: fixUnderlineBeforeNot
Comment: Fix a double underline before inserted words

Name: fixUnknownPatthern
Comment: Fix an unexplained pattern _/_left in Matt 18:12
